name: HoCWar
description: Immerse yorself into the harsh world of ruthless card battles!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/ 8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium D or AMD Athlon 64 X2 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 (256 MB) or ATI Radeon X1600 Pro (256 MB) or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/ 8/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6600 (2.4 GHz) or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000+ (2.6 GHz) or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT (512 MB) or ATI Radeon HD 4850 (512 MB) or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c
